function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for contagion in close spatial arrangements","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures, ventilation systems, and air purification technologies","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purification technologies","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, architects, and engineers"},{"Description":"Transmission of diseases in industrial applications","Impact":"Possibility of disease transmission through close contact or shared spaces in industrial settings","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures, hygiene protocols, and regular testing of employees","Technologies":"Hygiene protocols, testing technologies","People":"Employees in industrial settings","Owner":"Industrial managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Impact of spatial layout on disease transmission","Impact":"The spatial organization of objects and elements can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Using optimized layout design, spatial planning algorithms, and technology-assisted space allocation","Technologies":"Space-filling curves, genetic algorithms, spatial planning algorithms","People":"Architects, designers, and spatial planners","Owner":"Design professionals, technology developers"}]}
